import React from "react"; import Navbar from "../Navbar/Navbar"; import fire from "../../images/fire.gif"; import guy from "../../images/guy.png"; import { Reveal2, Reveal3, Reveal4, RevealPic } from "../utils/Reveal"; const BannerIntro = () => { return (

Hi, I'm Hanson

I build and design industry standard web applications.

); }; export default BannerIntro;
